resp = client.search(
    index="drivers",
    query={
        "nested": {
            "path": "driver",
            "query": {
                "nested": {
                    "path": "driver.vehicle",
                    "query": {
                        "bool": {
                            "must": [
                                {
                                    "match": {
                                        "driver.vehicle.make": "Powell Motors"
                                    }
                                },
                                {
                                    "match": {
                                        "driver.vehicle.model": "Canyonero"
                                    }
                                }
                            ]
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp)
